name: Quetzi
storyline:
The Feathered Serpent seeks revenge

Help Quetzi return to his place in the Teotihuacan Burial. You can choose to play for free or make a one-time payment to play Quetzi with no ads, and enjoy your adventure to the fullest without interruptions from start to finish.
summary:
What would happen if the game of the Snake was mixed with the legend of Quetzalcoatl?

Well, that is Quetzi.

Based on the Teotihuacan imagery, Quetzi will challenge you to complete the body of the Feathered Serpent through different worlds, sorting all kinds of obstacles…

and defeating mighty gods.
